name: nuclide-file-tree
description: Provides the new file tree panel for Nuclide
author: Nuclide : Core UI

revealFileOnSwitch.title: Reveal File on Switch
revealFileOnSwitch.description: Automatically reveal the current file when you switch tabs

hideIgnoredNames.title: Hide Ignored Names
hideIgnoredNames.description: Hide paths that match the "Ignored Names" under "Settings > Core Settings"

allowKeyboardPrefixNavigation.title: Enable prefix-based keyboard navigation
allowKeyboardPrefixNavigation.description: Allows using the keyboard to navigate to a sibling node matching a prefix string

showOpenFiles.title: Show open files
showOpenFiles.description: Display a list of currently opened files in the top section of the tree

showUncommittedChanges.title: Show uncommitted changes
showUncommittedChanges.description: Display a list of uncommitted changes in the top section of the tree

showUncommittedChangesKind.title: What kind of changes to show
showUncommittedChangesKind.description: Show changes from which part of your current stack

autoExpandSingleChild.title: Auto expand single child
autoExpandSingleChild.description: Automatically expand single child directory when parent is expanded

focusEditorOnFileSelection.title: Focus editor on file selection
focusEditorOnFileSelection.description: Focuses the editor when a file is selected and previewed
